mapper.select: WITH SecondLevelComments AS (SELECT c2.creator, c2.create_time, c2.reply_member_id, c2.comment_id, c2.parent_comment_id, c2.comment_raw_html, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c2.parent_comment_id ORDER BY c2.create_time desc) AS rn FROM chirp_product_post_comment AS c2 WHERE c2.parent_comment_id IN #{item}) SELECT comment_id, parent_comment_id, comment_raw_html, reply_member_id, creator, create_time FROM SecondLevelComments WHERE rn <= 5
